title: Home
author: Santa Barbara Family Chiropractic
cleaned_text: Santa Barbara Family Chiropractic Our personal mission is to EMPOWER our clients to CREATE LASTING HEALTH and FREEDOM from disease through chiropractic care. We get results that other health care providers don't get. We use a comprehensive technique of chiropractic that less than 2% of chiropractors are trained in. This method produces lasting results, usually within 60-90 days of treatment. Our practice includes a combination of traditional chiropractic, spinal remodeling traction, postural exercises, and lifestyle education to break habits that contribute to poor posture, pain, and dysfunction. Call us today to set up your first appointment
